segments.text: Yes , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Room 705 . The air conditioner in my room doesn't work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have that taken care of immediately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And may I have two more towels , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . We'll bring you the towels in just a minute .
segments.speaker: S2
